title: Starfield's name-remembering robot buddy can't do 'Glenn' or 'Greg,' but it will call you 'Captain Assface'
description: Please, that's what people call my father. Just 'Assface,' thanks.

title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 has been quietly rebuilt by Dear Esther developer The Chinese Room with 'different gameplay mechanics and RPG systems'
description: The game's now slated for a fall 2024 release.

title: One mad modder has already gotten Baldur's Gate 3's semi-secret 'evil' companion working in good guy playthroughs
You can play all of Starfield with the voice of Adam Jensen by your side, and I very much recommend it
description: One of Starfield's best companions is voiced by Deus Ex actor Elias Toufexis.

title: Baldur's Gate bestiary: The origins of D&D's odder creatures
description: Beholders, displacer beasts, githyanki. Who the hell comes up with this stuff?

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #805: Saturday, September 2
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.

title: Starfield players agree that its first dozen hours are its weakest: 'OK, 12 hours in, and I love it'
description: Don't let its clunky intro scare you away.

title: Nope, not a bug: Starfield's city maps just look like that
description: Starfield players are coming to terms with the RPG's loose approach to cartography.
